channel.title: Pk points help!
channel.description: Ok, So I own the server hybrid pvpv3. It is a [PI] server. So when players kill someone, they get 5 pk points. But players are getting stuck at around 5-25 pk points, and they will not receive any more pk points. Is there some kind of bug with the pk system? I really need this fixed! Someone please help me!

item.title: Pk points help!
item.dc:creator: @chrisrocks4122 chrisrocks4122
item.description:
@chrisrocks4122 wrote:

Ok, So I own the server hybrid pvpv3. It is a [PI] server. So when players kill someone, they get 5 pk points.
But players are getting stuck at around 5-25 pk points, and they will not receive any more pk points. Is there
some kind of bug with the pk system? I really need this fixed! Someone please help me!
